response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds immense value and relevance to you, just like it does to us. Considering its worth and the unique benefits it offers, we propose a transaction price of $1,200,000. This offer aims to ensure a mutually beneficial agreement while respecting the significant investment this product represents for both parties. We believe this price reflects the true value and potential return on your investment. Please let us know if you would like to discuss this further or proceed with the purchase.", "product_price": 1200000}
